name: Neuroboss
description:
Any donations received  will go towards autism research:
https://www.autistica.org.uk/get-involved/autisticaplay




This is just a sketch of a game about becoming manager of a team of neurodiverse individuals. The one thing that they have in common is that they think and work in unusual ways. But each of them is very different, with various strengths and challenges that you need to learn to work with.

Can you keep all of your team happy and supported at work, and make money for your company as well?
